content.text:
Based on my analysis of the AICERA website codebase, I can provide comprehensive SEO improvement recommendations. Here's what I found and my suggestions:

## Current SEO Analysis

**Strengths:**
- ✅ Next.js 15 with App Router (good for SEO)
- ✅ Basic metadata implementation
- ✅ Internationalization support (en/nl)
- ✅ Responsive design with proper viewport settings
- ✅ Lazy loading for performance
- ✅ Semantic HTML structure

**Areas for Improvement:**
- ❌ Missing robots.txt
- ❌ Missing sitemap.xml
- ❌ Limited metadata (no keywords, author, etc.)
- ❌ No structured data (JSON-LD)
- ❌ Missing Open Graph images
- ❌ No canonical URLs
- ❌ Missing meta descriptions for different pages
- ❌ No analytics/tracking setup

## SEO Improvement Implementation

Let me implement these improvements:

### 1. Create robots.txt

content.lineBasedDiff:
--- public/robots.txt
+++ public/robots.txt
@@ -0,0 +1,12 @@
+User-agent: *
+Allow: /
+
+# Sitemap
+Sitemap: https://aicera.com/sitemap.xml
+
+# Disallow admin or private areas (add as needed)
+# Disallow: /admin/
+# Disallow: /private/
+
+# Allow all search engines to crawl
+Crawl-delay: 1

content.text: ### 2. Create sitemap.xml

content.lineBasedDiff:
--- app/sitemap.ts
+++ app/sitemap.ts
@@ -0,0 +1,40 @@
+import { MetadataRoute } from 'next'
+
+export default function sitemap(): MetadataRoute.Sitemap {
+  const baseUrl = 'https://aicera.com'
+  
+  // Define your supported locales
+  const locales = ['en', 'nl']
+  
+  // Define your main pages
+  const pages = [
+    '',
+    '/#our-ambition',
+    '/#what-we-do',
+    '/#about-us',
+    '/#transformation',
+    '/#our-impact',
+  ]
+
+  const sitemap: MetadataRoute.Sitemap = []
+
+  // Generate sitemap entries for each locale and page
+  locales.forEach(locale => {
+    pages.forEach(page => {
+      sitemap.push({
+        url: `${baseUrl}/${locale}${page}`,
+        lastModified: new Date(),
+        changeFrequency: 'monthly',
+        priority: page === '' ? 1 : 0.8,
+        alternates: {
+          languages: {
+            en: `${baseUrl}/en${page}`,
+            nl: `${baseUrl}/nl${page}`,
+          }
+        }
+      })
+    })
+  })
+
+  return sitemap
+}

content.text: ### 4. Add Structured Data (JSON-LD)

content.lineBasedDiff:
--- components/structured-data.tsx
+++ components/structured-data.tsx
@@ -0,0 +1,178 @@
+import Script from 'next/script'
+
+interface StructuredDataProps {
+  locale: string
+}
+
+export default function StructuredData({ locale }: StructuredDataProps) {
+  const organizationSchema = {
+    "@context": "https://schema.org",
+    "@type": "Organization",
+    "name": "AICERA",
+    "alternateName": "AI-Cera",
+    "description": "AICERA, a division of Twilight Systems, delivers cutting-edge IT solutions powered by AI and human expertise for enterprise, healthcare, and education sectors.",
+    "url": "https://aicera.com",
+    "logo": "https://aicera.com/logo.svg",
+    "image": "https://aicera.com/og-image.jpg",
+    "foundingDate": "2024",
+    "founder": {
+      "@type": "Person",
+      "name": "Samanyu B Rao"
+    },
+    "address": {
+      "@type": "PostalAddress",
+      "addressLocality": "Bengaluru",
+      "addressRegion": "Karnataka",
+      "addressCountry": "IN"
+    },
+    "contactPoint": {
+      "@type": "ContactPoint",
+      "contactType": "customer service",
+      "availableLanguage": ["English", "Dutch"]
+    },
+    "sameAs": [
+      "https://linkedin.com/company/aicera",
+      "https://twitter.com/aicera_tech"
+    ],
+    "parentOrganization": {
+      "@type": "Organization",
+      "name": "Twilight Systems"
+    },
+    "serviceArea": {
+      "@type": "Place",
+      "name": "Global"
+    },
+    "areaServed": ["IN", "US", "EU", "Global"],
+    "knowsAbout": [
+      "Artificial Intelligence",
+      "Cloud Computing",
+      "Cybersecurity",
+      "Digital Transformation",
+      "IT Consulting",
+      "Software Development"
+    ]
+  }
+
+  const websiteSchema = {
+    "@context": "https://schema.org",
+    "@type": "WebSite",
+    "name": "AICERA",
+    "url": "https://aicera.com",
+    "description": "Advanced IT Solutions powered by AI and human expertise",
+    "inLanguage": [locale],
+    "potentialAction": {
+      "@type": "SearchAction",
+      "target": "https://aicera.com/search?q={search_term_string}",
+      "query-input": "required name=search_term_string"
+    }
+  }
+
+  const serviceSchema = {
+    "@context": "https://schema.org",
+    "@type": "Service",
+    "name": "IT Solutions and Digital Transformation Services",
+    "description": "Comprehensive IT solutions including cloud computing, cybersecurity, AI implementation, and digital transformation services.",
+    "provider": {
+      "@type": "Organization",
+      "name": "AICERA"
+    },
+    "serviceType": "Information Technology Services",
+    "areaServed": "Global",
+    "hasOfferCatalog": {
+      "@type": "OfferCatalog",
+      "name": "IT Services",
+      "itemListElement": [
+        {
+          "@type": "Offer",
+          "itemOffered": {
+            "@type": "Service",
+            "name": "Cloud Computing & Infrastructure",
+            "description": "Enterprise-grade cloud solutions designed for scalability and performance"
+          }
+        },
+        {
+          "@type": "Offer",
+          "itemOffered": {
+            "@type": "Service",
+            "name": "Cybersecurity & Risk Management",
+            "description": "Comprehensive security solutions to protect your digital assets"
+          }
+        },
+        {
+          "@type": "Offer",
+          "itemOffered": {
+            "@type": "Service",
+            "name": "AI-Powered Solutions",
+            "description": "Artificial intelligence solutions combining technology with human expertise"
+          }
+        },
+        {
+          "@type": "Offer",
+          "itemOffered": {
+            "@type": "Service",
+            "name": "Digital Transformation",
+            "description": "End-to-end digital transformation services for modern businesses"
+          }
+        }
+      ]
+    }
+  }
+
+  const breadcrumbSchema = {
+    "@context": "https://schema.org",
+    "@type": "BreadcrumbList",
+    "itemListElement": [
+      {
+        "@type": "ListItem",
+        "position": 1,
+        "name": "Home",
+        "item": `https://aicera.com/${locale}`
+      },
+      {
+        "@type": "ListItem",
+        "position": 2,
+        "name": "Our Services",
+        "item": `https://aicera.com/${locale}#what-we-do`
+      },
+      {
+        "@type": "ListItem",
+        "position": 3,
+        "name": "About Us",
+        "item": `https://aicera.com/${locale}#about-us`
+      }
+    ]
+  }
+
+  return (
+    <>
+      <Script
+        id="organization-schema"
+        type="application/ld+json"
+        dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{
+          __html: JSON.stringify(organizationSchema),
+        }}
+      />
+      <Script
+        id="website-schema"
+        type="application/ld+json"
+        dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{
+          __html: JSON.stringify(websiteSchema),
+        }}
+      />
+      <Script
+        id="service-schema"
+        type="application/ld+json"
+        dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{
+          __html: JSON.stringify(serviceSchema),
+        }}
+      />
+      <Script
+        id="breadcrumb-schema"
+        type="application/ld+json"
+        dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{
+          __html: JSON.stringify(breadcrumbSchema),
+        }}
+      />
+    </>
+  )
+}

--- app/[locale]/layout.tsx
+++ app/[locale]/layout.tsx
@@ -101,6 +101,9 @@
 
 	return (
 		<html lang={locale}>
+		<head>
+			<StructuredData locale={locale} />
+		</head>
 		<body suppressHydrationWarning>
 		<NextIntlClientProvider messages={messages} locale={locale}>
 			{children}

content.text: ### 6. Create Web App Manifest

content.lineBasedDiff:
--- app/manifest.ts
+++ app/manifest.ts
@@ -0,0 +1,39 @@
+import { MetadataRoute } from 'next'
+
+export default function manifest(): MetadataRoute.Manifest {
+  return {
+    name: 'AICERA - Advanced IT Solutions',
+    short_name: 'AICERA',
+    description: 'AI-powered digital transformation and IT solutions for enterprises',
+    start_url: '/',
+    display: 'standalone',
+    background_color: '#ffffff',
+    theme_color: '#0D1B2A',
+    orientation: 'portrait-primary',
+    categories: ['business', 'technology', 'productivity'],
+    lang: 'en',
+    icons: [
+      {
+        src: '/favicon.ico',
+        sizes: '16x16 32x32',
+        type: 'image/x-icon',
+      },
+      {
+        src: '/icon-192.png',
+        sizes: '192x192',
+        type: 'image/png',
+      },
+      {
+        src: '/icon-512.png',
+        sizes: '512x512',
+        type: 'image/png',
+      },
+      {
+        src: '/apple-touch-icon.png',
+        sizes: '180x180',
+        type: 'image/png',
+        purpose: 'apple-touch-icon',
+      },
+    ],
+  }
+}

content.text: ### 7. Enhance Next.js Configuration for SEO

content.lineBasedDiff:
--- next.config.mjs
+++ next.config.mjs
@@ -3,6 +3,64 @@
 import createNextIntlPlugin from "next-intl/plugin";
 
 const withNextIntl = createNextIntlPlugin("./i18n/request.ts");
-const nextConfig = {};
+
+const nextConfig = {
+  // Enable static exports for better SEO
+  trailingSlash: false,
+  
+  // Image optimization
+  images: {
+    formats: ['image/webp', 'image/avif'],
+    deviceSizes: [640, 750, 828, 1080, 1200, 1920, 2048, 3840],
+    imageSizes: [16, 32, 48, 64, 96, 128, 256, 384],
+  },
+  
+  // Compression
+  compress: true,
+  
+  // Security headers
+  async headers() {
+    return [
+      {
+        source: '/(.*)',
+        headers: [
+          {
+            key: 'X-Frame-Options',
+            value: 'DENY',
+          },
+          {
+            key: 'X-Content-Type-Options',
+            value: 'nosniff',
+          },
+          {
+            key: 'Referrer-Policy',
+            value: 'origin-when-cross-origin',
+          },
+          {
+            key: 'Permissions-Policy',
+            value: 'camera=(), microphone=(), geolocation=()',
+          },
+        ],
+      },
+    ]
+  },
+  
+  // Redirects for SEO
+  async redirects() {
+    return [
+      {
+        source: '/home',
+        destination: '/',
+        permanent: true,
+      },
+    ]
+  },
+  
+  // Experimental features for better performance
+  experimental: {
+    optimizeCss: true,
+    scrollRestoration: true,
+  },
+};
 
 export default withNextIntl(nextConfig);

+import %7B MetadataRoute %7D from 'next'%0A%0Aexport default function sitemap(): MetadataRoute.Sitemap %7B%0A  const baseUrl = 'https://aicera.com'%0A  %0A  // Define your supported locales%0A  const locales = %5B'en', 'nl'%5D%0A  %0A  // Define your main pages%0A  const pages = %5B%0A    '',%0A    '/#our-ambition',%0A    '/#what-we-do',%0A    '/#about-us',%0A    '/#transformation',%0A    '/#our-impact',%0A  %5D%0A%0A  const sitemap: MetadataRoute.Sitemap = %5B%5D%0A%0A  // Generate sitemap entries for each locale and page%0A  locales.forEach(locale =%3E %7B%0A    pages.forEach(page =%3E %7B%0A      sitemap.push(%7B%0A        url: %60$%7BbaseUrl%7D/$%7Blocale%7D$%7Bpage%7D%60,%0A        lastModified: new Date(),%0A        changeFrequency: 'monthly',%0A        priority: page === '' ? 1 : 0.8,%0A        alternates: %7B%0A          languages: %7B%0A            en: %60$%7BbaseUrl%7D/en$%7Bpage%7D%60,%0A            nl: %60$%7BbaseUrl%7D/nl$%7Bpage%7D%60,%0A          %7D%0A        %7D%0A      %7D)%0A    %7D)%0A  %7D)%0A%0A  return sitemap%0A%7D
